thread.title: Leslie Jones Auditions to be Alec Baldwin’s Trump Understudy on SNL
thread.title_full: Leslie Jones Auditions to be Alec Baldwin’s Trump Understudy on SNL

author: Ken Meyer
title: Leslie Jones Auditions to be Alec Baldwin’s Trump Understudy on SNL
text:
Leslie Jones Auditions to be Alec Baldwin’s Trump Understudy on SNL by Ken Meyer | 8:06   
Alec Baldwin won’t be able to play President Trump on Saturday Night Live forever, but fortunately, Leslie Jones says she’s ready to give America “what it wants.” 
The sketch comedy show took on the Trump administration yet again last night, and Jones said in a behind-the-scenes bit that she wants to be the next one to impersonate the Commander-in-Chief. Jones dedicated herself to studying Trump’s speeches and mannerisms, even as co-stars Vanessa Bayer and Sasheer Zamata tried to warn her that her audition for the part of Trump would not end well. 
The moment Jones walked in to audition, SNL Executive Producer Lorne Michaels straight up told her “It’s not gonna happen, Leslie.” Jones proceeds to demolish his office while yelling about how she “got range,” and security escorts her out quickly enough for Jones to see Bayer walk in for her own Trump audition. 
Jones’ impression seems to be good enough for “ Melania Trump ” however, seeing as the First Lady invited Jones inside her limo as she just so happened to be passing by 30 Rock. 
Watch above, via NBC.
